title: New Zealand Deputy Prime Minister arrives in Sri Lanka
byline: Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Foreign Affairs of New Zealand, Winston Peters arrived in Sri Lanka on an official visit.

title: Malini Fonseka’s remains at NFC for public tribute
byline: The remains of veteran actress Malini Fonseka have been brought to the National Film Corporation for the public to pay their final respects.

title: SJB organiser Ashoka Sepala Anagipura resigns
byline: Ashoka Sepala Anagipura, the Co- Electoral Organiser of the Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) for the Nuwara Eliya District and former Mayor of the Lidula Urban Council in Talawakelle, has announced his resignation.

title: Two young boys killed in motorbike accidents
byline: Two young boys were killed in two separate accidents involving motorbikes yesterday, Police said.

title: Miss England Quits Miss World Pageant, Says She Felt Like a ’Prostitute’ for Wealthy Male Sponsors
byline: Miss England dropped out of the 72nd Miss World pageant in Telangana, India, criticizing the ’’outdated’’ competition for exploiting and objectifying its contestants.

title: Veteran Actress Malini Fonseka passes away
byline: Veteran actress Malini Fonseka, who had become a household name in Sri Lanka, passed away at the age of 78.

title: Delayed decisions cause for drug shortages: Health Minister
byline: Delays in procurement decisions during 2024 have led to current shortages of essential medicines in Sri Lanka, said Health Minister Nalinda Jayatissa.

title: Daniel Noboa sworn in as Ecuador’s new president
byline: Daniel Noboa, who won Ecuador’s presidential runoff election on April 13, took the oath of office for the 2025–2029 term in a ceremony at the National Assembly in the capital Quito.
